d.Name: Process Integration Pipeline - Generic Integration Flows and Templates.7.4.2025.14.29.25
d.Description:
This integration package contains the generic integration flows as well as a set of templates for the scenario-specific integration flows required to setup a Process Integration (PI) pipeline on Cloud Integration for asynchronous and synchronous message processing. The pipeline for Cloud Integration can be seen as a sort of framework providing exactly once delivery, error handling and restart capabilities out of the box.

The following features are supported:

  • Support for most commonly used Enterprise Integration Patterns such as Point-to-Point, Content-Based-Router, Recipient List, etc.
  • Asynchronous pipeline for asynchronous message processing with decoupling of pipeline steps via limited number of JMS queues
  • Synchronous pipeline for synchronous Content-Based-Router scenarios
  • Generic inbound flows for XI inbound and IDoc inbound scenarios
  • Flexible scenario configuration via Partner Directory
  • Retry and error handling capabilities incl. dead letter queue handling
  • Improved monitoring by supporting SAP headers and custom header properties
  • Extension for custom error handling
  • Extension for custom receiver and interface determination
  • Option to reuse extended receiver determination mappings from SAP Process Orchestration
  • Support for test mode
  • Supporting different tenant stages, e.g., DEV, QA, PRD

More details on the PI pipeline concept can be found on the Migration Guide for SAP Process Orchestration.
d.ShortText: This integration package contains the generic integration flows required to setup a Process Integration pipeline on Cloud Integration including templates for setting up the scenario-specific integration flows.
